dmca.title: Cloning of our website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 
________________________________

From: Ed Towers [mailto:ed@tigerbrokerage.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 12, 2006 4:41 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Cloning of our website


Ms. Andrea Almeida,
 
The website of www.tigerbrokerage.net <http://www.tigerbrokerage.net/>
is registered to PUBLICDOMAINREGISTRY.COM .  Please review the attached
letter.  It should be readily obvious that the .net is a clone of our
website www.tigerbrokerage.com <http://www.tigerbrokerage.com/>
(.com).  The only difference is an additional tab on job opportunities.
They are even using our biographies and pictures.  People pay them money
in advance to apply for a financial management position.  This is an
obvious scam.  We have no business outside the U.S. nor any financial
management positions.  In addition to talking with our corporate
attorney about this problem,  we have notified the Federal Trade
Commission, the FBI, and the Secret Service.  The FBI has set up a file
on this case.  Please let me know how you want to proceed as niave
people are losing money on this illegal activity.  
 
Ed Towers
 
Edward W. Towers, CBI, M&AMI, QFP, MBA, CSA, RFC
President
TIGER Brokerage Group
1381 Conway Road
Lake Forest, IL, 60045
phone: (847) 283-0371
fax: (847) 283-0376
Email: ed@tigerbrokerage.com
